reviewText: I love this story about the spoon family. Mother spoon is so positive and encouraging for her child to express himself. She doesn't judge, but makes sure her son knows she hears him. I've used it for 24 to 36 months old child.
This will work quite well in my various aged classrooms. I enjoy having the books on a DVD to review as well.  Thank you.
We have most of these DVDs - it's a great series. The narrator reads as the words are displayed on the screen with the animation.
I bought this along with several other DVD's to upgrade from VHS that we use in our Kindergarten class room.  Received them in a few days and they were all new and in complete packaging.
My 3 1/2 year old daughter loves this book!  She reads it over and over and then when she is tired of reading it, I read it to her at her request.
My grandchildren love this movie and wanted it.  It is very entertaining and they learned about themselves and others with it.

You must buy these very inexpensive videos of stories of interest for all children, they are well worth and price!
If you like good stories read to you, stories that have incredible twists and turns, some teaching some valuable life lessons...then these are the videos to buy for all ages.....All of the sellers I've encountered have been wonderful!!!! too!!
